scripts.backend:setup: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "cd .\backend; if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; . .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install --upgrade pip; pip install flask flask-cors openai pandas"
